text: The 1893 Hillsdale Dales football team was an American football team that represented Hillsdale College in the 1893 college football season. The team compiled a 4–1 with its only loss being against Notre Dame at South Bend, Indiana. ==Schedule== http://www.und.com/sports/m-footbl/archive/nd-m-footbl- sched-1893.html ==References== Hillsdale Category:Hillsdale Chargers football seasons Hillsdale Football
title: 1893 Hillsdale Dales football team
